page.title: 04School House Project
page.content:
The School House Project is to renovate the school house so it can be used by Corvedale playgroup and school.
The school house used to be the school master's house but is now used by Corvedale playgroup.It has fallen into disrepair and therefore needed a great deal of work.
The project started as a unanimous decision between the school and playgroup committees.The money was raised by sponsored events,dances, school funds and wine and cheese evenings.The jobs to be done are:put in damp-proof coursing,make repairs to roof,replaster it,put in new skirting boards demolish a wall and repaint the whole house.Most of the work was voluntary and mostly done by parents.
